item.title: How to Read Tire Wear
item.description: There’s no doubt about it that tire’s are expensive. Unless you’re an auto-cross enthusiast then you probably don’t enjoy shopping for tires. While it may be impossible to make your tires last forever, there are several tricks to help squeeze every mile out of them. Checking your tires about once a month is a quick and simple task that anyone can do. Tires are sensitive to a multitude of factors ranging from tire pressure, wheel alignment, worn out suspension components, and more.
